fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to balance professionalism with modern readability, suitable for a resume layout.
fontTheory.readability: The chosen font families are highly legible both in print and digital formats, ensuring easy reading for potential employers.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The typographic hierarchy is established through font sizes, weights, and styles, guiding the reader through sections of the resume.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Helvetica Neue for headings and titles provide a clean and modern look, contrasting well with the traditional serif font Georgia for body text, creating a harmonious balance.
